game.name: Fishy 3D

game.shortDescription: An adventure game about a hungry fish üêü Dive, jump, swim and eat your way through a lush micro-world. Can you escape the polluted pond?

reviewHighlights.text: I love this game, reminds me of a lot of games I loved as a kid. can just turn my brain off an explore, I love the fishy games. I've played all of the...
